video_description: http://hothardware.com/Reviews/Toshiba-Thrive-7-Tablet-Review/ - The Toshiba Thrive 7 is, for all intents and purposes, a 7-inch version of the original 10-inch Thrive, including the NVIDIA Tegra 2 SoC platform its built upon.  Which of course is not a bad thing at all.  Tegra 2 Android Honeycomb-based tablets are solid solutions.
title: Toshiba Thrive 7 Review: Honeycomb on 7 Inches - HotHardware

comments.text: Don't listen to anyone. Try﻿ them all out yourself before buying, if you're interested.
